entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
